violations.description: More than 1000 people in a single zone at any time.
violations.recommendation: Limit the number of people to less than 1000.

violations.description: Persons should not be nearby unless they have badges of colors green, light blue, dark blue, purple, orange.
violations.recommendation: Ensure that only authorized personnel are present.

violations.description: Flag unattended bags, weapons, or unknown packages.
Flag any fighting, running, or aggressive gestures.
All persons in work zones must wear required PPE (hard hat, vest).
violations.recommendation: Ensure all personnel are wearing the correct PPE.

report.summary: The observation is non-compliant with security rules. The number of people in a single zone exceeds the maximum limit set by rule R001. Authorized personnel should be limited to only those with green, light blue, dark blue, purple, orange badges as per rule R002.
